response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its high value to you, we are confident it will be a worthwhile investment.

We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate, considering its market value and the benefits it offers.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are here to assist you with any questions or concerns you might have during this process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
